title: Help with figuring out a font for rock and roll design please
content:
Could anyone tell me what font this is, and then perhaps the best way of slightly tweaking it? I would be greatly appreciative as I am a novice at such things.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090501221144im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Black_Rebel_Motorcycle_Club-Baby_81-Frontal%5B1)

author: limonata
